context.name: FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount
context.excerpt: The FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount is a highly functional and cost-effective upgrade for your Glock handgun, enables an upper Picatinny rail for optics and a front underside rail for foregrips or flashlights.
context.content:
The FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount is a highly functional and cost-effective upgrade for your Glock handgun, enables an upper Picatinny rail for optics and a front underside rail for foregrips or flashlights.

 

Glock Scope Mount Advantages:

Accepts all 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny based sights
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Original sights remain functional
Quick and easy installation
Facilitates prompt sight alignment
Adds a front underside accessory rail in place of the used original

 

Glock Scope Mount Compatibility:

All GLOCKÂ® 9mm/.40/.357 SIG models with accessory rail.
